About

I have been working with radios since my Civil Air Patrol days back in 1991. I have always enjoyed technology and emergency communications. Used packet back in the CAP days. Currently enjoying D-STAR and DMR. Extensive background with Healthcare based Emergency Communications, working along side SC DHEC, SC EMD, SCHEART.
